title: Bug 102516 - JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: Bug 102516 - JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in your data source.
OB: Currently, the tree control loads all the tables and columns immediately upon opening the JDBC Data Set Editor page.
EB: The tables and columns should be loaded only when the user expands the tree or applies a filter.
SR:
1. Open the JDBC Data Set Editor page.
2. Observe that all the tables and columns are loaded immediately.
3. Expand the tree or apply a filter.
4. Observe that the tables and columns are loaded on demand as the tree is expanded or filtered.
